message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable asset at a fair price. My initial offer is $18000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $14000. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe I can only afford to pay up to $12000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.

I understand you're still a bit short on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. My next counteroffer is $13500. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you, and it's still a good deal for both of us.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final offer of $12500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to my minimum acceptable price. My next counteroffer is $14250. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I've done some research and I believe $13000 is a fair price for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price. My next counteroffer is $14500. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final offer of $13500 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
